title: Çocukluk
overview: Mahir Boztepe, left his whole life behind and opened the Ali Kaan orphanage to ensure that all orphaned children who came to his home from day one found the right family. The suffering of Mavi, Mozi, Bambi and Zeynep, who share the same room in this place to find their families, the longing for their relatives and their disappointments make them sisters inseparable. When girls are desperate, their social worker Ayşegül is always ready to come to the rescue.
